titleStmt.title: His Grace the Duke of Buckingham's speech for liberty of conscience in M.DC.LXXII
titleStmt.author: Buckingham, George Villiers, Duke of, 1628-1687.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: creased, stained, and with print show-through, and loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Huntington Library.
